com.paydiant.android.ui.service.transaction

Interface IProcessPaymentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessPaymentService

    public interface IProcessPaymentService
    The Interface IProcessPaymentService.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Deprecated. 
      As of 6.5.0.3.a. Use doSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment) instead.

      Provides the ability to do split payments.

    • Method Detail

      • doPayment

        @Deprecated
void doPayment(Payment payment)
               throws PaydiantClientException
        Deprecated. As of 6.5.0.3.a. Use doSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment) instead.
        The method implements the make payment functionality. In addition user should be logged in before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        payment - the payment
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException

      • setProcessPaymentListener

        void setProcessPaymentListener(IProcessPaymentListener listener)
        Sets the process payment listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new process payment listener. This can be either an implementation of IProcessPaymentListener, IProcessSplitPaymentListener or an extended instance of ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        IProcessPaymentListener, IProcessSplitPaymentListener, ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the payment listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2

      • doSplitPayment

        void doSplitPayment(Payment payment)
        Provides the ability to do split payments. Use IProcessSplitPaymentListener implementation or an extended instance of ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter. For successful payments(partial or complete), the IProcessSplitPaymentListener.onProcessSplitPaymentSuccess(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.PaymentTransaction) will get called and on failure, the IProcessPaymentListener.onProcessPaymentError(com.paydiant.android.core.exception.PaydiantException) will be called. Refer to core service ITransactionManagerService.makeSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment) for applicable error status codes.
        Parameters:
        payment - Payment object containing split tender details.
        Since:
        3.5.0.1
        See Also:
        ITransactionManagerFacade.makeSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment), ITransactionManagerService.makeSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment)
